spells.name: Banishment
spells.description: Banishes 2 HD/level of extraplanar creatures.

spells.name: Sequester
spells.description: Subject is invisible to sight and scrying; renders creature comatose.

spells.name: Spell Turning
spells.description: Reflect 1d4+6 spell levels back at caster.

spells.name: Instant Summons
spells.description: Prepared object appears in your hand.

spells.name: Mage's Magnificent Mansion
spells.description: Door leads to extradimensional mansion.

spells.name: Phase Door
spells.description: Creates an invisible passage through a barrier.

spells.name: Plane Shift
spells.description: As many as eight subjects travel to another plane.

spells.name: Summon Monster VII
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Teleport, Greater
spells.description: As teleport, but no range limit and no off-target arrival.

spells.name: Teleport Object
spells.description: As teleport, but affects a touched object.

spells.name: Arcane Sight, Greater
spells.description: As arcane sight, but also reveals magic effects on creatures and objects.

spells.name: Scrying, Greater
spells.description: As scrying, but faster and longer.

spells.name: Vision
spells.description: As legend lore, but quicker.

spells.name: Hold Person, Mass
spells.description: As hold person, but all within 30 ft.

spells.name: Insanity
spells.description: Subject suffers continuous confusion.

spells.name: Power Word Blind
spells.description: Blinds creature with 200 hp or less.

spells.name: Symbol of Stunning
spells.description: Triggered rune stuns creatures.

spells.name: Delayed Blast Fireball
spells.description: 1d6/level fire damage; you can postpone blast for up to 5 rounds.

spells.name: Forcecage
spells.description: Cube or cage of force imprisons all inside.

spells.name: Grasping Hand
spells.description: Hand provides cover, pushes, or grapples.

spells.name: Mage's Sword
spells.description: Floating magic blade strikes opponents.

spells.name: Prismatic Spray
spells.description: Rays hit subjects with variety of effects.

spells.name: Invisibility, Mass
spells.description: As invisibility, but affects all in range.

spells.name: Project Image
spells.description: Illusory double can talk and cast spells.

spells.name: Shadow Conjuration, Greater
spells.description: As shadow conjuration, but up to 6th level and 60% real.

spells.name: Simulacrum
spells.description: Creates partially real double of a creature.

spells.name: Control Undead
spells.description: Undead don't attack you while under your command.

spells.name: Finger of Death
spells.description: Deals 10 damage/level to one subject.

spells.name: Symbol of Weakness
spells.description: Triggered rune weakens creatures.

spells.name: Waves of Exhaustion
spells.description: Several targets become exhausted.

spells.name: Control Weather
spells.description: Changes weather in local area.

spells.name: Elemental Body IV
spells.description: Turns you into a Huge elemental.

spells.name: Ethereal Jaunt
spells.description: You become ethereal for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Form of the Dragon II
spells.description: Turns you into a Large dragon.

spells.name: Giant Form I
spells.description: Turns you into a Large giant.

spells.name: Plant Shape III
spells.description: Turns you into a Huge plant.

spells.name: Polymorph, Greater
spells.description: Gives one willing subject a new, more powerful form.

spells.name: Reverse Gravity
spells.description: Objects and creatures fall upward.

spells.name: Statue
spells.description: Subject can become a statue at will.

spells.name: Limited Wish
spells.description: Alters reality (within limits).
